name: PeerMe MultiSig: Sign Action
title: Sign a proposal
description: Sign a multi-sig proposal as a board member. Your signature counts toward reaching the quorum required to execute the proposal. Only board members can sign.

inputs.name: Action ID
inputs.description: The ID of the proposal to sign.
inputs.bot: If the user hasn't specified an action ID, first run 'Get Pending Actions' to show what's available.

messages.success: Proposal {{ACTION_ID}} signed successfully. Your signature has been recorded.

label.en: Get notified when quorum is reached after signing
label.de: Benachrichtigung erhalten, wenn das Quorum nach der Unterzeichnung erreicht ist

body.en: Proposal #{{ACTION_ID}} has reached quorum and is ready to be executed
body.de: Vorschlag #{{ACTION_ID}} hat das Quorum erreicht und ist bereit zur Ausführung
